translations.This space has more than the maximum sub: This space has more than {{maxTreeLength}} subspaces. The data below is sampled from only the first {{maxTreeLength}} retrieved subspaces.
translations.By default, the number of subspaces retr: By default, the number of subspaces retrieved and sampled in the charts below is capped at {{maxTreeLength}} total spaces.
translations.The charts below display a sample of act: Displaying {{numActionsRetrieved}} actions from a requested sample of {{requestedSampleSize}} actions.
translations.By default, only a sample of actions is: By default, a sample of maximum {{requestedSampleSize}} actions is requested and displayed in the charts below, in order to provide a general overview of activity in this space and its subspaces.
